trans-unit.source: The ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement class represents a configuration element for an <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A classe ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement representa um elemento de configuração para um <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> can be configured for server applications using standard configuration files.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>podem ser configuradas para aplicativos de servidor usando arquivos de configuração padrão.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement>, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Quando este construtor é usado para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>classe, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A>está definida como <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement>, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A>está definida como <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario>e o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection>está definida como `null`.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance should be set to appropriate values for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>instância da classe deve ser definida para os valores apropriados para o aplicativo antes de chamar o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: The BuildPolicy method builds a new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance based on the properties set on the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O método BuildPolicy cria um novo <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> instância como base as propriedades definidas no <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance must be set before calling the BuildPolicy method.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>instância da classe deve ser definida antes de chamar o método BuildPolicy.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> instance that represents the extended protection policy created.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"> </xref> instância que representa a política de proteção estendida criada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o personalizado nome de provedor de serviço (SPN) lista usada para correspondência com SPN um cliente para este elemento de política de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref> that includes the custom SPN list used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"> </xref> que inclui a lista SPN personalizada usada para correspondência com o SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the policy enforcement value for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de imposição de política para este elemento de política de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"></xref> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement"> </xref> valor que indica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de proteção imposta pela diretiva de proteção estendida para este elemento de política de configuração.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"></xref> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario"> </xref> valor que indica o tipo de proteção aplicado pela política.
